ability.flavor: You reshape the flow of time in the target's body to return it to an earlier state.

metadata.flavor: You reshape the flow of time in the target's body to return it to an earlier state.

effects.effect: Choose two of the following effects: - The target can spend any number of Recoveries. - The target gains 1 of their Heroic Resource, and can end any effects on them that are ended by a saving throw or that end at the end of their turn. - The target gains 2 surges, and gains a +3 bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.
You and the target both permanently grow visibly younger (the equivalent of 20 human years, to the minimum of an 18-yearold). Additionally, you are weakened and slowed (save ends).
